column4: Fryguy, how about upgrading from dapper to fesity then to gutsy and then to hardy?
you can upgrade directly from dapper to hardy
your CD burner is probably broken
what do you mean? did you check the checksum of the files before burning them?
and you got errors there?
just burn it on a different computer then, obviously something is either wrong with your burner or your media
i only have one computer with a burner in it
then get it at a friends place or at work
i rather upgrade from dapper to hardy
then why don't you do it?
thats what i-m intending to do
why do you do what? you can upgrade directly to hardy
http://ubuntu-tutorials.com/2008/04/23/upgrade-ubuntu-606-to-ubuntu-804/ there's a howto
if you can just cancel your current upgrade process and let it roll back to the original state then update straight to hardy
it'll save you hours of work
just press shift + comma
I meant shift + dot
you don't get a semicolon from up there you're supposed to press Shift + Comma
you get a < when you press shift + comma?
aah sorry I missed the part where you said you had a spanish keyboard layout or something
; ; ; ; ; just copy paste from here
1. why don't you just change your keyboard layout? 2. if you just need one comma somewhere why don't just copy paste it from here?
System --> Preferences --> Keyboard, then click the layout tab
